topics.title: Planting flowers
topics.body: I wanted to plant some flowers on the side of the house. I then started looking up the different plants I wanted to plant. I got some bricks to landscape the area by my flower garden
topics.author: LaQuisha Cain

topics.title: Working on projects
topics.body: I decided to go back though my projects I built earlier to optimize them. I can even add them to my resume. Recording the skills I used to build that particular project
topics.author: LaQuisha Cain

topics.title: Watching an episode of the Kitchen
topics.body: We are watching an episode of The Kitchen. We like watching food TV shows. I should add the current food shows, The Kitchen and Beat Body Flay, to my Wordpress website
topics.author: LaQuisha Cain
